author: jwaldman
msg: TRINIDAD-1914 provide a hook for external decorator to find trinidad-skins.xml from a location other than META-INF or WEB-INF.

third party users will extend SkinResourceLoader and create their own findResource. If filename is trinidad-skins.xml, then it should return the Iterator<URL> to all trinidad-skins.xml files it finds.

msg: AVRO-662. Java: Add support for reading Hadoop sequence files as Avro data to MapReduce API.

msg: PIG-1508 Make 'docs' target (forrest) work with Java 1.6
